item.description:
Now that you have been able to use the new A-Muse-A-Palooza images to get a head start on your holiday cards, it's time to have some fun playing with A Muse's adorable new summer stamp release! At the Summer Fun Cards class, you will make five (5), summery, fun, and cute cards, using A Muse Artstamps's wonderful line of papers, wood-mounted rubber stamps, ribbons, and embellishments, along with a variety of crafts punches and other tools, to create truly special handmade greetings. All materials and supplies will be provided.


Date: Wednesday, July 29 at 6:30pm
Duration: 2 hours
Fee: $25, includes materials
Skill Level: All Ages

We canceled Sunday's class so if you are interested in Wednesday, please call Abeille Tuesday - Sunday at 617-232-4343 to register.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Fun Card Making Workshop ($25)
